programme.title: Look Who's Talking Now
Gle tko to govori 3
programme.desc:
Look Who's Talking Now: Directed by Tom Ropelewski. With John Travolta, Kirstie Alley, David Gallagher, Tabitha Lupien. The dogs can talk at a family of 4, where mom loses her job the same day dad gets a job as pilot for a cute, single boss." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0107438/","name":"Look Who's Talking Now","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg5OWQ3NzYtZTkwNi00YjE2LWFiNTMtNmVlNjdiZTA4YWIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The dogs can talk at a family of 4, where mom loses her job the same day dad gets a job as pilot for a cute, single boss.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0107438/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tired and predictable","reviewBody":"Look Who's Talking Now is not absolutely unwatchable and certainly not the worst movie ever made, but for me it is weakest of the series. I really enjoyed the first, and while watchable the second was a disappointment. Look Who's Talking Now has its good points, such as the soundtrack and the two dogs voiced wonderfully by Danny DeVito and Diane Keaton. Plus it is not too bad visually.

However, the concept has been done to death but the story feels very tired this time around, and to further disadvantage there are one too many thin and predictable gags and weak lines in the script. Other than DeVito and Keaton the other acting wasn't so impressive, this time John Travolta and Kirstie Alley seem to be phoning in their performances as the bickering couple. And the ending was far too sentimental for my liking.

Overall, perhaps worth the look but it is disappointing for me anyway. 3/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":28614,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Family","Romance"],"datePublished":"1993-11-05","keywords":"third in trilogy,last of series,1990s,movie flop,third part","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Look Who's Talking Now","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2794651929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTdlNjFlZGEtZDhjMi00ZTZmLTg1ZDQtMDM0YTJhOWJiNDMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTdlNjFlZGEtZDhjMi00ZTZmLTg1ZDQtMDM0YTJhOWJiNDMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000263/","name":"Kirstie Alley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302356/","name":"David Gallagher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740568/","name":"Tom Ropelewski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740568/","name":"Tom Ropelewski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228908/","name":"Leslie Dixon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002132/","name":"Amy Heckerling"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Meet the Parents
Dozvola za brak
programme.desc:
Meet the Parents: Directed by Jay Roach. With Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner. Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0212338/","name":"Meet the Parents","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGNlMGZiMmUtZjU0NC00MWU4LWI0YTgtYzdlNGVhZGU4NWZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0212338/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjw2305"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great comedy","reviewBody":"Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) is a male nurse, poised to propose to the woman he loves, Pam (Teri Polo) but the right thing to do would be to ask her father's permission first. During a weekend of getting to know them, he manages to make a strong impression; for all the wrong reasons. Her father (Robert De Niro) isn't quite what Greg has been led to believe, and right from the start he seems to have it in for his daughter's partner.

De Niro and Stiller play off each other brilliantly, and both of them give fine comic performances, with a surprising level of depth for comedy characters. This film is packed with slick gags, hilarious scenes and it has a really fun story; it's a comedy film that you don't want to miss.

8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320431,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-01-17","keywords":"misunderstanding,father in law,male nurse,nurse,cat","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi877640473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwODYwODEtNDdiOS00NGY5LThkZjAtMWFkNzY4ZTdlZTViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwODYwODEtNDdiOS00NGY5LThkZjAtMWFkNzY4ZTdlZTViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001632/","name":"Teri Polo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005366/","name":"Jay Roach"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012648/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322839/","name":"Greg Glienna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0164898/","name":"Mary Ruth Clarke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381272/","name":"Jim Herzfeld"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

Firstly, movie is not near as good as Sniper 1. And secondly some words about this so called Serbian fighters. I'm from Slovenia and I speak Serbian language. But in this movie I didn't understand not even one word. At the end of the movie I saw this list of actors. Those names are not Serbian but Hungarian. I don't know who (I know only that he's mind doesn't work as it should) said to director of this movie that Hungary and Serbia is one and the same country. Language, habits, mentality, nothing is the same in these two countries. It's very sad that someone is making a movie about country and he doesn't even knows basics about this country. Language, habits, mentality, nothing is the same in these two countries. It's very sad that someone is making a movie about country and he doesn't even knows basics about this country. programme.title: Aty ku fshihen Dragonjtë
programme.desc: Wes Bentley, Dougray Scott. Një gazetar investigativ zhgropos rastësisht sekrete të të atit, ndërsa heton mbi jetën e diskutueshme të themeluesin të organizatës "Opus Dei", gjatë Luftës Civile Spanjolle.

programme.title: Zodiaku kinez
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Oliver Platt. Një gjuetar thesaresh dhe skuadra e tij fillojnë një aventurë ndërkombëtare në kërkim të një koke bornzi, që është një nga 12 shenjat e zodiakut kinez.

aventurë

programme.title: Ujku
programme.desc: Britani e madhe, 150 e.r. Pasi katër lajmëtarë romakë me mesazh paqeje zhduken në veri të murit të Hadrianit, dhjetë prej ushtarëve më të mirë të Romës ngarkohen të zbulojnë se çfarë u ka ndodhur.

programme.title: Beteja për Vjenën
programme.desc: Në verën e vitit 1683, 300 mijë luftëtarë të perandorisë Otomane sulmuan Vjenën. Rënia e këtij qyteti do të hapte portat e Evropës. Kjo është historia e betejës vendimtare të 11 shtatorit të po atij viti.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.desc: M.Douglas, K.Turner. 6 muaj pas aventurës së parë, Xhoanës i caktohet të shkruajë një biografi mbi sundimtarin e lig të një shkretëtire, por ajo futet në telashe në kërkim të një guri të çmuar dhe Xhek Koltoni i vjen sërish në ndihmë.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Siguri maksimale 2
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren. Xhek, ish-bashkëpunëtor i CIA-s, mbikqyr një gurp elitar keqbërësish. Pas një pune arrestohen dhe dërgohen në burgun e sigurisë më të lartë. Për të fituar lirinë, ai duhet të grabisë paratë e burgut dhe të shpëtojë ekipin.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Pagesa
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Aaron Eckhart. Pasi mëson se kujtesa e tij është fshirë, një inxhinier kompjuterash merr arratinë dhe përpiqet të zbulojë të vërtetën, ndërkohë që ndiqet nga vrasës të shumtë.

programme.desc: I.Cube.Të gjithë janë vënë në kërkim të agjentit më të ri XXX. Një i ri me rekorde kriminale dhe obsesione sportive ekstreme duket të jetë kandidati perfekt. Një grusht shteti po planifikohet. Tani fjalën e ka vetëm agjenti XXX.

programme.title: Bobi Z

programme.desc: 2016.Matt Damon, Tian Jing, Willem Dafoe. Dy mercenarë në kërim të barutit, e gjejnë veten të përfshirë në mbrojtjen e 'Murit të Madh' në Kinë që po sulmohet nga ushtri gjigante përbindëshish.

programme.title: Luftanija

programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.desc: Brie Larson, Cillian Murphy. Kur një tregti armësh shkon tmerrësisht keq, një grua e gjen veten në mes të një shkëmbimi zjarri dhe detyrohet të gjejë shpëtim nga një ndërtesë e mbushur me njerëz që nuk ta përtojnë plumbin.

programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Kurt Rusell. Dy policë super rivale që do të detyrohen të bashkepunojnë per te organizuar arratisjen e tyre nga burgu, e per t'u vënë më pas në ndjekje të kriminelit që ua punoi.

programme.desc: Steve Austin, Eric Roberts. Një grup të arratisurish, marrin peng një agjent të kufirit dhe vajzën e tij adoleshente dhe fshihen në pyll. Por instinkti për mbijetesë do ta bëjë agjentin të fillojë gjuetinë e hakmarrjes...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.desc: Maisie Williams, Bill Milner. Kur copëzat e telefonit të tij inteligjent nguliten në kokën e një adoleshenti, ai zbulon se mund të kontrollojë pajisjet elektronike dhe përdor fuqinë e tij të re për t'u hakmarrë.

programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren, Mickey Rourke. Një njësi rebele e njohur me emrin "Bastardët e Luftës" duhet kalojnë përtej vijës së armikut për të marrë armën sekrete të Hitlerit me çdo mjet të mundshëm.

luftë

programme.title: Shpejtësi pa kufi
programme.desc: Një garues ilegal, i sapodalë nga burgu ku e futi ish ortaku i pasur, hyn ne një garë me qëllim hakmarrjen. Pasi e mëson këtë gjë, ish ortaku vendos një çmim të madh për kokën e tij ndërkohë që ka nisur gara.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Arrati dhe çmenduri
programme.desc: E.Hawke, S.Gomez. Ish piloti i garave me makina, Brent Magna e gjen veten në një gare kundër kohës, për të shpëtuar gruan e tij të rrëmbyer. Me një makinë super të shpejtë, Brent duhet të bëjë gjithçka që i thotë një zë i panjohur...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Makina 19
programme.desc: Paul Walker. Një i ri i liruar me kusht, udhëton në një qytet tjetër në përpjekje për të filluar një jetë të re... Por kur në makinën e marrë me qira, ai zbulon një armë dhe një vajzë të lidhur, ai kupton se është shënjestra e policisë...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Poseidon
programme.desc: K.Rusell, J.Lucas. Eshtë mbrëmja e fundit të vitit në transoqeanikun Poseidon. Kanë filluar festimet. Ndërkaq, në urën e anijes, kapiteni i parë, i tmerruar, kupton që diçka s'shkon. Një valë gjigande po i afrohet anijes me shpejtësi marramendëse.

aventurë

arte marciale

programme.desc: Jackie Chan. Jackie Chan. Pasi ndihmon heroikisht policinë të arrestojë liderin e garave të paligjshme me makina të Hong Kongut, Foh, një mekanik i thjeshtë, duhet të përballet me të në një garë vendimtare, pasi ai arratiset nga burgu.

sport
krim

programme.title: Kënga e liqenit Suei
programme.desc: Pas vdekjes së të atit, një koleksionist i ri xhazi rekruton një mik për ta ndihmuar të vjedhë një disk muzikor me vlerë nga shtëpia e familjes së tij buzë liqenit. Plani përmbyset kur bashkëpunëtori bie në dashuri me gjyshen e tij aristokrate.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Në dashuri me time shoqe
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma. Fitues i 3 çmimeve kinematografike dhe kandidat për 7 të tjerë. I martuar me një grua, e cila nuk e dashuron, një bashkëshort i ri vendos të shndërrohet në një tjetër njeri për të fituar zemrën e saj.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Një vit i mbarë
programme.desc: Russell Crowe, Marion Cotillard. Një bankier i suksesshëm, trashëgon një vreshtë nga ungji që s'e shihte prej vitesh dhe menjëherë mendon ta shesë. Por disa të papritura do t'i shtyjnë planet e tij kushedi edhe për sa kohë...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Njeriu i motit
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage. Një parashikues moti, jeta personale e të cilit po shkon si mos më keq, merr një ofertë tunduese punësimi dhe vendoset përpara dilemës nëse duhet të ndjekë ëndrrën, apo të qëndrojë në përpjekje për të 'riparuar' gjithçka...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Sweet home Alabama
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon, Josh Lucas, Patrick Dempsey. Një vajzë e re, që vite më parë braktisi burrin e saj në Alabama dhe u bë stiliste e suksesshme, duhet të rikthehet në vendlindje dhe t'i japë fund zyrtarisht të kaluarës.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Në dashuri dhe në luftë
programme.desc: S.Bullock, C.O'Donnell. Ernest Heminguej, reporteri që përjetoi luftën e parë botërore, shkrimtari që u dashurua marrëzisht me një infermiere. Një histori mbi kurajon në kohë frike. Një histori e vërtetë dashurie në kohë lufte.
programme.category: Regjia: Richard Attenborough

programme.title: Pas jetës ka më shumë
programme.desc: Robin Williams, Annabella Sciorra, Cuba Gooding Jr. Film fitues i çmimit Oskar dhe 4 çmimeve të tjera kinematografike. Pasi vdes në një aksident me makinë, një njeri braktis parajsën dhe niset në kërkim të gruas së tij, e cila vrau veten.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Pallati i bardhë
programme.desc: Susan Sarandon dhe James Spader interpretues te denje te nje historie te zjarrte dashurie, te vleresuar nga kritika. Nje djale i ri i ve dhe nje grua e guxhimshme do te jetojne nje pasion nga ato qe te ndryshojne jeten.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Franklin Ruzvelt, një burrë i vendosur
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh, Cynthia Nixon. Ai udhëhoqi Amerikën përmes Depresionit të Madh dhe Luftës II Botërore. Por sfida më e vështirë e Ruzveltit iu mbajt sekret kombit të tij: lufta e tij për të bërë përpara pasi mbeti i paralizuar nga poliomeliti.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Ëndrra amerikane
programme.desc: Dy vëllezër që largohen nga vendlindja e tyre në Kolumbi, për t'u transferuar në Shtetet e Bashkuara, hasin vështirësi të ballafaqojnë ëndrren e tyre amerikane me realitetin e tyre të ri.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dallimet që na afrojnë
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear, Renée Zellweger, Djimon Hounsou. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë te një tregtuesi veprash arti, i cili detyrohet të miqësohet me një njeri të pastrehë, në dukje të rrezikshëm, vetëm për të shpëtuar martesën e tij...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shkruar dashuri në krahët e saj
programme.desc: Kat Dennings, Chad M.Murray. Bazuar ne një histori të vërtetë, që filloi një lëvizje globale! Një vajzë adoleshente e varur nga droga gjen forcën të futet në rrugën e rikuperimit edhe krijon një fondacion që ka ndihmuar mijëra njerëz...
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Sin City
programme.desc: Ne qytetin e mekateve drejtesine e kane blere. Nuk ka vend per te miret dhe per te dobetit. Gjithkush kerkon ta kete ligjin ne dore dhe ne emer te tij te hakmerret. Ne Sin City dikush duhet t'u jape fund mekateve.
programme.category: Thriller- Sub. Ang

programme.title: Zhdukjet në Rrugën 7
programme.desc: Disa banorë të Detroitit zgjohen një mëngjes dhe zbulojnë se përveç atyre, e gjithë popullsia është zhdukur. Me diellin që po perëndon dhe çdo burim tjetër drite të zhdukur, ata zbulojnë se e keqja e madhe vjen nga errësira.
programme.category: Thriller-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Përmes Universit
programme.desc: Evan Rachel Wood, Jim Sturgess. Nën sfondin e këngëve të Beatles dhe protestave kundër luftës në Vietnam, vjen historia e dashurisë midis një vajze të pasur amerikane dhe një artisti të varfër anglez.
programme.category: Dramë romantike-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Legjenda e luftëtarit të cunamit
programme.desc: Një princ dhe një ushtri piratësh kërkojnë të pushtojnë një mbretëri bregdetare. Edhe pse mbretëria me anë të aleatëve për pak kohë mund t'i bëjë ballë sulmit, shpresa e tyre e vetme është një djalosh i cili ka aftësi të mbinatyrshme.
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ondine
programme.desc: Colin Farrell. Viti i prodhimit: 2009. Nga regjisori fitues i çmimit Oskar Neil Jordan, si një përrallë vjen historia e një peshkatari irlandez, i cili zbulon se në rrjetën e tij, ka zënë një vajzë të bukur.
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Siguri maksimale
programme.desc: Steven Seagal, Steve Austin. Dy ish ushtarë të forcave speciale, në mbrojtje të dy femrave të burgosura, detyrohen të përballen me një ushtri mercenarësh, të cilët kërkojnë me çdo kusht eliminimin e vajzave...
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ti, unë dhe Duprija
programme.desc: O.Wilson, K.Hudson. Carl dhe Molly sapo janë kthyer nga muaji i mjaltit kur në shtëpinë e tyre mbin Randolph Dupree, beqar i regjur dhe shoku i ngushtë i Carl-it. I braktisur nga e dashura, pa punë, pa shtëpi, si t'ia refuzosh atij mikepritjen?
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Dyluftimi i Fundit
programme.desc: Sean Faris, Djimon Hounsou. Jake Tyler s'po integrohet dot në shkollën e tij të re. Ai takohet me një veteran të arteve marciale, i cili do ta stërvisë të përdorë trurin dhe trupin për t'u ndeshet me kampionin lokal të arteve marciale.
programme.category: Arte marciale-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Një Tokë tjetër
programme.desc: Brit Marling, William Mapother. Në natën që zbulohet një Tokë tjetër në sistemin tonë diellor, jetët e një studenteje ambicioze dhe një kompozitori kryqëzohen dhe ndryshojnë përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Samaritani
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson, Luke Kirby. Pas 25 vitesh në burg, një njeri vendos të fillojë një jetë të re. Takimi me një grua bukuroshe duket se do t'i japë mundësinë që i duhej, por e kaluara e tij kriminale nuk e lë të qetë.
programme.category: Thriller-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Rrezik në Bangkok
programme.desc: N.Cage. Jeta e një vrasësi me pagesë do të marrë një kthesë të papritur kur ai shkon në Bangkok për kontratën e tij të fundit. Ai operon në bazë të 4 rregullave, por për herë të parë do t'i thyejë ato, duke u përfshirë në një lidhje me një vajzë vend.
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Adventureland
programme.desc: Jesse Eisenberg, Kristen Stewart. Në verën e vitit 1987, një i ri që sapo ka mbaruar shkollën, detyrohet të fillojë punë në një park ujor. Por pikërisht aty, ai do të përjetojë një aventurë që e çon më pranë se kurrë botës së të rriturve.
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ushtari universal 3
programme.desc: Me ndihmën e një teknologjie të vjedhur të përparuar, terroristët kanë krijuar ushtarin universal të gjeneratës së re. Ata kanë shtënë në dorë centralin bërthamor të Çernobilit duke u shndërruar në një kërcënim për boten. Titrat shqip-anglisht.
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Idlewild: Pasion dhe ritëm
programme.desc: Dy anëtarët e grupit mjaft të njohur Outkast, André Benjamin dhe Big Boi, në një film mbi pasionin, ritmin dhe problemet e shumta në një kabare për njerëzit me ngjyrë, gjatë viteve të Prohibicionizmit.
programme.category: Dramë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Misioni: Santa Klaus
programme.desc: Gjithcka që Alex dëshiron, është të vërtetojë se 'Babagjyshi' ekziston. Me ndihmën e motrës se tij Elizabeta dhe kushërinjëve Zoi dhe Riçard, ai vendos kamera në të gjithë shtëpinë, për të xhiruar momentin e shumë pritur.
programme.category: Familjar-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ne emer te mbretit
programme.desc: Jason Statham. Nje mbreteri kercenohet nga forcat e erreta te nje magjistari i cili do te kete pushtet absolut, por nje fermer i thjeshte do te rrembeje armet dhe do te luftoje kunder tij ne emer te mbreterise dhe lirise se popullit.
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Ringritja
programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow, Tim McGraw. Në kërkim të ringritjes në karrierë, një këngëtare dikur e famshme, bashkëpunon me një kompozitor të talentuar dhe shumë shpejt mes tyre lind një romancë e ngatërruar, që rrezikon të shkatërrojë gjithçka...
programme.category: Dramë-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Shenjat
programme.desc: Mel Gibson. Familja Hess jeton në Pennsylvani. Tek zgjohen një mengjes ata gjejne në oborrin pas shtepise një rreth me diameter mbi 150 metra. Ne emisionet informative ata do mesojne se rrathe te tille jane shfaqur ne tere boten.
programme.category: Mister-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Faza e lojës
programme.desc: R.Crowe, B.Affleck. Stiven Kollins është një kongresmen i suksesshëm, karriera e të cilit do të rrezikohet pas vrasjes së assitentes së tij. Një gazetar investigativ, njohje e tij e vjetër, do të vihet në kërkim të së vërtetës.
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Sunshine cleaning
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Amy Adams, Emily Blunt, Alan Arkin, etj. E vendosur për të dërguar djalin e saj në një shkollë private, një nënë beqare bashkë me motrën, hapin një biznes për të pastruar skenat e krimit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Forcat e ndërhyrjes së shpejtë
programme.desc: Ray Winstone, Ben Drew. Bazuar në serialin anglez mjaft të suksesshëm të viteve 1970. Një skuadër e policisë së Londrës, përdor të njëjtat taktika brutale si dhe kriminelët, për t'ju dhënë ndëshkimin e merituar.
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Fundi i ditëve
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne. Në ditët e fundit të shekullit të 20-të, djalli terrorizon Nju Jorkun dhe fati i gjithë botës është në duart e një polici.
programme.category: Fantazi
horror-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Kokëkrisuri
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell. Një njeri i verbuar nga mbetje toksike të cilat shtuan dhe ndjeshmërië e shqisave të tij, lufton krimin si një superhero akrobatik i arteve marciale. Titra shqip-anglisht.
programme.category: Sub. Ang

programme.title: Djem të mbarë
programme.desc: Tre 12-vjeçar lënë mësimin për të mësuar se si të puthin vajza, para se të shkojnë në një festë puthjesh. Ata do të nisin një aventurë epike ku vjedhin pa dashje pilula droge, përndiqen nga policia dhe nga vajza adoleshente të inatosura keq.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Pas Cak
programme.desc: Ndiqni prapa skenave te xhirimeve te filmit.
programme.category: Shooter

programme.title: Arktiku
programme.desc: Mads Mikkelsen. Një burrë i bllokuar në Arktik pas përplasjes së avionit, duhet të vendosë nëse të qëndrojë në sigurinë relative të kampit të improvizuar, apo të nisë një udhëtim vdekjeprurës me shpresën që të shpëtojë prej andej i gjallë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Mamin apo babin?
programme.desc: Antonio Albanese, Paola Cortellesi. Një çift që po divorcohet fillon një betejë të ashpër për tre fëmijët. Por kjo nuk është një betejë dosido sepse të dy po luftojnë që të mos e marrin kujdestarinë e tyre.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Përpara se të iki
programme.desc: 12 shkurti, është thjesht një ditë tjetër për Samantën, derisa kuptohet se është dita e saj e fundit. E bllokuar për të ripërjetuar ditën e fundit, ajo duhet të zbulojë misterin e vdekjes dhe gjithçka që po humbet përpara se të iki.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Krishtlindje në Jug
programme.desc: Massimo Boldi, Biagio Izzo, Anna Tatangelo. Ambrogio dhe Peppino po festojnë Krishtlindjet sëbashku me familjet. Kur zbulojnë se djemtë e tyre kanë takim me dy vajza, vendosin ti ndihmojnë që takimi tu shkojë sa më mirë.
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Fati i Loganëve
programme.desc: Channing Tatum, Adam Driver. Në përpjekje për të ndryshuar fatin e keq të familjes, vëllezërit Xhimi dhe Klajd Logan, përpiqen të realizojnë një grabitje spektakolare gjatë një gare të makinave 'Nascar'.
programme.category: Komedi
krim

programme.title: Mirë se erdhët President 2
programme.desc: Claudio Bisio. 8 vjet pas aventurave të filmit të parë, një njeri i thjesht, por me emirn prestigjoz, Xhuzepe Garibaldi thërritet sërish për një post të rëndësishëm politik.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Milionerë me borxhe
programme.desc: Zoey Deutch. Një vajzë e re mendjemprehtë, lindur dhe rritur në Bufalo, Nju jork, vendos të bëhet një mbledhëse borxhesh me shpresën për të shpëtuar nga borxhet e veta dhe nga vendlindja e saj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.desc: Henry Cavill, Ben Affleck. Bruce, është i vendosur të sigurojë që sakrifica përfundimtare e Supermenit të mos jetë e kotë. Me ndihmën e Diana Prince, ai rekruton një ekip superheronjsh për të mbrojtur botën nga një rrezik i afërt katastrofik.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Shpëtimi i pengut
programme.desc: Tajler Rejk, (Chris Hemsworth) një mercenar i patrembur që punon në tregun e zi, punësohet nga një Lord i fuqishëm i drogës indiane, për të shpëtuar të birin e rrëmbyer nga rivali i tij. Një mision gati i pamundur...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Sikario 2: Dita e ushtarit
programme.desc: 2018. Benicio del Toro, Josh Brolin. Bosët meksikanë të drogës po trafikojnë terroristë përgjatë kufirit me SHBA-në. Një agjent federal kërkon ndihmën e një vrasësi me pagesë për konfliktin që do të ngre dyshime mbi gjithçka që ata kanë luftuar.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Dawg: djali i prapë
programme.desc: Denis Leary, Elizabeth Hurley. Një don zhuan egoist dhe i pandjeshëm trashëgon një milion dollarë nga gjyshja e tij, por me një kusht: të rikontaktojë një pjesë të grave që ka joshur e braktisur, dhe t'i bind ato që ta falin.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Nipçja i gjyshes
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2006. Allen Covert, Linda Cardellini. Pasi shoku i dhomës shpenzon paratë e qirasë, një 35 vjeçar detyrohet të jetojë me gjyshen dhe dy shoqet e saj, duke filluar kështu një aventurë që s'do ta harrojë lehtë...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Orange County
programme.desc: Colin Hanks, Jack Black, Schuyler Fisk. Shaun, ëndërron të studiojë në një nga universitetet më të mirë. Por kur pas një ngatërrese ai refuzohet, s'mbetet gjë tjetër veç të kërkojë ndihmën e të dashurës së tij dhe të vëllait dështak.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Babai i nuses 2
programme.desc: Kur e bija t'i jape lajmin e gezuar se pret nje femije, ai do ta humbase krejt. Ndjehet ende teper i ri per t'u quajtur gjysh dhe teper krenar per te pranuar se tashme i ka hyre krizes se moshes se mesme.
programme.category: Steve Martin

programme.title: Një shkëndijë nga e kaluara
programme.desc: B.Fraser. Adami është biri i një shkencëtari. Në kohën kur kërcënimi i luftës bërthamore ishte i pranishëm, familja e tyre mbyllet në bunker për 35 vjet. Adami detyrohet të dalë nga bunkeri për të marrë ushqime dhe një grua për vete.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Banzai
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio, në rolin e një shitësi siguracionesh, i cili urdhërohet nga shefi i tij që të shkojë në Kanada. Por ashtu fare rastësisht, ai ngatërron avionë dhe e gjen veten në Lindjen e largët, ku e presin shumë të papritura...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Hot shots 2
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen, Lloyd Bridges, Valeria Golino. Parodi e filmit 'Rambo'. Toper Harli, rikthehet me një mision të ri. Këtë herë ai do të shkojë në Irak, për të shpëtuar disa pengje dhe skuadrat e shpëtimit që dështuan njëra pas tjetrës...
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Xhon Takeri duhet vrarë
programme.desc: 2006. J.Metcalfe, B.Snow, Ashanti. Hether, Carrie dhe Beth-i, 3 studente kolegji mësojnë se kanë dalë në të njëjtën kohë, pa dijenine e njëra-tjetrës, me të njëjtin djalë. Ato vendosin të marrin hak: Kush thyen zemren, nga zemra do të vdese.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Pothuaj e përkryer
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Annette Bening. Pasi karriera teatrale dhe jeta romantike e një vajze në Nju Jork, merr të tatëpjetën, ajo detyrohet të kthehet në qytezën e lindjes, ku e presin një sërë karakteresh nga të cilët ishte përpjekur të largohej.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Martesë në Bahamas
programme.desc: Massimo Boldi, Anna Maria Barbera, Enzo Salvi. Valentina dhe Bobi, kanë rënë në dashuri dhe kërkojnë të martohen në Bahamas. Por familjet e tyre shumë ndryshe nga njëra tjetra, do të kthejnë gjithçka përmbys...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Ky është Romeni
programme.desc: Dany Boon, Kad Merad.. Një 39 vjeçar që vuan nga shqetësimi për shëndetin e vet, ka si mik të vetëm doktorin e tij. Pikërisht doktori mendon për një zgjidhje të problemit të tij... t'i gjejë një grua me të cilën ai mund të shoqërohet.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Bebja e Brixhet Xhonsit
programme.desc: 2016. Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey. Brixhet Xhonsi i rikthehet karrierës dhe jetës beqareske derisa zbulon se është shtatzënë. Një lajm i gëzueshëm, por me një problem të vogël: ajo është vetëm 50% e sigurt se kush është babai.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Shefi, receta e lumturisë
programme.desc: Jean Reno, Michael Youn. Një shef kuzhine me eksperiencë, puna e të cilit rrezikohet nga pronari i ri i restorantit, bashkon forcat me një kuzhinier amator, në përpjekje për të shpëtuar karrierat e të dyve...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Para të hënës
programme.desc: Dy miq të ngushtë përfshihen në një aksident automobilistik me një bos të pamëshirshëm, i cili, në vend të dëmshpërblimit, i ngarkon me një mision të pamundur, që lidhet ngushtë me një vezë pashke misterioze...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Dado për një natë
programme.desc: Jonah Hill, Ari Graynor. Për të fituar pak para, një i ri i pezulluar nga universiteti, pranon të kujdeset për fëmijët trazovaçë të fqinjes. Por një telefonatë nga e dashura, e detyron të marrë fëmijët me vete, pa e ditur se ç'natë e pret.
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Lojë sadiste
programme.desc: Brittany Snow. E dëshpëruar për të shpëtuar nënën e sëmurë, një vajzë e re pranon të marrë pjesë në një lojë të organizuar nga një pasanik sadist, pa e ditur se në këmbim të parave ai u kërkon lojtarëve të bëjnë gjëra të tmerrshme.
programme.category: Fear Fest-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Gjej një punë
programme.desc: Pasi mbarojnë universitetin, një i ri (Miles Teller) dhe e dashura e tij (Anna Kendrick) e kanë shumë të vështirë të gjejnë një punë që ia vlen.
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Makina 19
programme.desc: Paul Walker. Një i ri i liruar me kusht, udhëton në një qytet tjetër në përpjekje për të filluar një jetë të re... Por kur në makinën e marrë me qira, ai zbulon një armë dhe një vajzë të lidhur, ai kupton se është shënjestra e policisë...
programme.category: Aksion-Sub. Ang

programme.title: 5 vitet e fundit
programme.desc: Anna Kendrick, Jeremy Jordan. Ekranizim i veprës së kompozitorit dhe poetit të njohur Xhejson Robert Braun. Një zbërthim muzikor i një lidhjeje dashurie dhe martese që ndodh gjatë pesë viteve...
programme.category: Muzikë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Sinkronicitet
programme.desc: Chad McKnight, Brianne Davis. Një fizikan udhëton para dhe pas në kohë për të ndalur një grua joshëse dhe një biznesmen të pashpirt që kërkon të vjedhë shpikjen e tij...
programme.category: Mister
fantashkencë-Sub.Ang

programme.title: Çapi
programme.desc: Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel. Historia e Çapit, një roboti të ngarkuar me inteligjencë artificiale, i cili rrëmbehet nga dy kriminelë për ta përdorur për qëllimet e tyre të errëta...
programme.category: Fantashkencë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Provimi i pjekurisë 2
programme.desc: Raoul Bova, Barbora Bobulova, Ambra Angiolini, Luca Bizzarri. Pasi më në fund e morën provimin e maturës, miq te vjetër, pothuajse 40-të vjeçarë tashmë, vendosin të shkojnë një javë me pushime, në një nga ishujt më rinorë grekë...
programme.category: Komedi-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Grushti i jetës
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal. I përballur me një tragjedi, kampioni i boksit Billi Houp, rrezikon të humbasë gjithçka, madje edhe kujdestarinë e vajzës. I vendosur për të rivënë në vijë jetën e tij, ai kërkon ndihmën e një trajneri të vjetër.
programme.category: Sport-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Deti i Zi
programme.desc: Jude Law, Scoot McNairy. Një ish oficer i marinës formon një skuadër për të kërkuar një nëndetëse naziste të mbushur me ar. Por shumë shpejt babëzia bën që të gjithë t'i kundërvihen njëri-tjetrit.
programme.category: Aventurë-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Një botë më e mirë
programme.desc: V. Kirby. Abigail jeton me burrin e saj në një fermë të izoluar. Kur në pranverë vjen një fqinjë e re, miqësia e dy grave shndërrohet shpejt në pasion, i cili fillon të mbushë boshllëkun që asnjëra prej tyre nuk e dinte që e kishte...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: 3 ditë për të vrarë
programme.desc: Kevin Costner, Amber Heart. Një agjent i CIA-s mëson se vuan nga sëmundje e pashërueshme dhe përpiqet të afrohet me vajzën adoleshente. Por një zgjidhje i ofrohet: një mjekim që mund t'i shpëtojë jetën në këmbim të një pune të fundit.

thriller-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Reporteri i natës
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal. Një i ri i pa punë, zbulon se reporterët e pavarur, fitojnë shumë para duke regjistruar krime të ndryshme. Por etja e tij për të qënë i pari që raporton, e bën që të shkelë vijën e hollë midis vëzhgimit dhe pjesëmarrjes.
programme.category: Krim-Sub. Ang

programme.title: Klubi i fitimtarëve

thriller

programme.title: A Star Is Born
Zvijezda je rođena
programme.desc:
A Star Is Born: Directed by Bradley Cooper. With Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Andrew Dice Clay. A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1517451/","name":"A Star Is Born","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE5ZmE3OGItNTdlNC00YmMxLWEzNjctYzAwOGQ5ODg0OTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1517451/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"One star that really does shine","reviewBody":"Had heard nothing but great things about this latest 'A Star is Born' film, with even my own sister saying it was a must see. There was also the interest to see how Lady Gaga would fare in her acting debut and how Bradley Cooper would fare as first-time director. Decided to see it when taking a break from practise with nothing else better to do, going in with very high expectations, as part of my "seeing as many 2018 films as possible" quest.

This is not the only, or first, 'A Star is Born' film. There is one from 1937 with Mitzi Gaynor and Fredric March, my personal favourite. There is one from 1954, the most famous, which is overlong but does contain Judy Garland's best ever performance and terrific songs (especially the heart-wrenching "The Man That Got Away"), love James Mason in it too. There is the 1976 film with Barbra Streisand, personally don't care for it but Streisand sings beautifully and "Evergreen" is to die for.

As far as the versions of 'A Star is Born' goes, this one from 2018 compares extremely favourably. Not quite as good as the 1937 film, but on the same level as 1954 and better than 1976. May not love it as much as others, but the appeal is justified and the acclaim is deserved from my personal perspective. In terms of films from 2018, 'A Star is Born' is among the better ones.

It's not perfect. A few story elements are a touch rushed and lack credibility, like Ally getting stage spotlight in such a short space of time, and occasionally it's a little on-the-nose like the making Ally glitzier advice from Rez.

The final act also could have been tightened, slightly too padded and dragged out.

What 'A Star is Born' does so well is taking a familiar story and making it still fresh and relatable. It's always entertaining and glamorous yet the love story is every bit as important, and even more so, and is both charming and emotionally impactful. Everything about 'A Star is Born' is slick, endlessly entertaining and with lots of heart and surprising poignancy, also had the experience of not a dry eye being in the auditorium with tears silently rolling with me.

Visually, it's very eye catching and sumptuously made, beautifully shot with lots of glitzy glamour and style. Loved the songs, none are quite on the same level as "The Man That Got Away" and "Evergreen" but they are extremely well written, easy to remember, have a wide range of emotions, are very well sung and staged, are integrated beautifully integrated into the story, some moving the story forward or telling it through the song rather than being a grinding things to a halt distraction. "I'll Never Love Again" and "Shallow" stand out.

Dialogue has wit and heart and the story shines particularly in the first third. Cannot say anything bad about the performances, with Lady Gaga providing a contender for the most surprising performances of the year in a quite outstanding acting debut (her singing is also absolutely great of course), a star is born indeed. Bradley Cooper gives one of his best performances as a charismatic and charming yet conflicted leading man, do not associate him with musicals and worried as to whether he would fit but it fits him like a glove. He too directs for the first time, and it is hard to believe that a directing job this slick and audacious was only his debut, really do disagree about his contributions being a vanity project with so much effort being put into everything. There is fine support from particularly Sam Elliott and the chemistry between the two leads is wholly believable.

Altogether, very, very good and often splendid. 8/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":355027,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-05","keywords":"alcoholism,tinnitus,rising star,singer songwriter,singer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi94288665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":"A movie star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000385/","name":"Sam Elliott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605792/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744839/","name":"Eric Roth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3391497/","name":"Will Fetters"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Lady Gaga (role=Ally), Bradley Cooper (role=Jack), Sam Elliott (role=Bobby), Andrew Dice Clay (role=Lorenzo), Rafi Gavron (role=Rez Gavron), Anthony Ramos (role=Ramon), Dave Chappelle (role=George 'Noodles' Stone), Alec Baldwin (role=Alec Baldwin), Marlon Williams (role=Marlon Williams), Brandi Carlile (role=Brandi Carlile), Ron Rifkin (role=Carl), Barry Shabaka Henley (role=Little Feet)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1517451, Title: A Star Is Born, --- Description: A Star Is Born: Directed by Bradley Cooper. With Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott, Andrew Dice Clay. A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1517451/","name":"A Star Is Born","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE5ZmE3OGItNTdlNC00YmMxLWEzNjctYzAwOGQ5ODg0OTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1517451/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird","dateCreated":"2018-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"One star that really does shine","reviewBody":"Had heard nothing but great things about this latest 'A Star is Born' film, with even my own sister saying it was a must see. There was also the interest to see how Lady Gaga would fare in her acting debut and how Bradley Cooper would fare as first-time director. Decided to see it when taking a break from practise with nothing else better to do, going in with very high expectations, as part of my "seeing as many 2018 films as possible" quest.

This is not the only, or first, 'A Star is Born' film. There is one from 1937 with Mitzi Gaynor and Fredric March, my personal favourite. There is one from 1954, the most famous, which is overlong but does contain Judy Garland's best ever performance and terrific songs (especially the heart-wrenching "The Man That Got Away"), love James Mason in it too. There is the 1976 film with Barbra Streisand, personally don't care for it but Streisand sings beautifully and "Evergreen" is to die for.

As far as the versions of 'A Star is Born' goes, this one from 2018 compares extremely favourably. Not quite as good as the 1937 film, but on the same level as 1954 and better than 1976. May not love it as much as others, but the appeal is justified and the acclaim is deserved from my personal perspective. In terms of films from 2018, 'A Star is Born' is among the better ones.

It's not perfect. A few story elements are a touch rushed and lack credibility, like Ally getting stage spotlight in such a short space of time, and occasionally it's a little on-the-nose like the making Ally glitzier advice from Rez.

The final act also could have been tightened, slightly too padded and dragged out.

What 'A Star is Born' does so well is taking a familiar story and making it still fresh and relatable. It's always entertaining and glamorous yet the love story is every bit as important, and even more so, and is both charming and emotionally impactful. Everything about 'A Star is Born' is slick, endlessly entertaining and with lots of heart and surprising poignancy, also had the experience of not a dry eye being in the auditorium with tears silently rolling with me.

Visually, it's very eye catching and sumptuously made, beautifully shot with lots of glitzy glamour and style. Loved the songs, none are quite on the same level as "The Man That Got Away" and "Evergreen" but they are extremely well written, easy to remember, have a wide range of emotions, are very well sung and staged, are integrated beautifully integrated into the story, some moving the story forward or telling it through the song rather than being a grinding things to a halt distraction. "I'll Never Love Again" and "Shallow" stand out.

Dialogue has wit and heart and the story shines particularly in the first third. Cannot say anything bad about the performances, with Lady Gaga providing a contender for the most surprising performances of the year in a quite outstanding acting debut (her singing is also absolutely great of course), a star is born indeed. Bradley Cooper gives one of his best performances as a charismatic and charming yet conflicted leading man, do not associate him with musicals and worried as to whether he would fit but it fits him like a glove. He too directs for the first time, and it is hard to believe that a directing job this slick and audacious was only his debut, really do disagree about his contributions being a vanity project with so much effort being put into everything. There is fine support from particularly Sam Elliott and the chemistry between the two leads is wholly believable.

Altogether, very, very good and often splendid. 8/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":355027,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-05","keywords":"alcoholism,tinnitus,rising star,singer songwriter,singer","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi94288665","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmMxMDRlNGMtMDQzOC00NjVlLWFhOTktMzA1Y2I3Yjc2MjFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":"A movie star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000385/","name":"Sam Elliott"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456097/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605792/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744839/","name":"Eric Roth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3391497/","name":"Will Fetters"],"duration":"PT2H16M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Before Midnight
Prije ponoći
programme.desc: Before Midnight: Directed by Richard Linklater. With Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick, Jennifer Prior. We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2209418/","name":"Before Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NzgxODE2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI1NTI0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2209418/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mmaggiano"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Before Midnight","reviewBody":"Before Midnight is the third of three movies, shot about a decade apart each, starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy as lovers with a very push-pull dynamic. It's not necessary to see the first two movies to follow Before Midnight. The movie features long takes (sometimes not cutting for 10 minutes at a time) the story takes place over a day, and dialogue and naturalistic acting are paramount. There's a complexity to their characters and relationship that refuses to fully romanticize or demonize them. It's something of a realist romance in (deliberate) contrast the beautiful settings. Careful viewers will notice a handful of ironies that ground the romance in reality. I won't give examples here, or go into the details that keep me from giving this a 9 or 10 as many critics do. The movie is the proverbial breath of fresh air, though. I'd say that the main weakness of the movie stems from its strengths, in that when artists set out to make something so true to human nature (as opposed to fluffier rom coms or Nicholas Sparks movies) it's easy to hear the (few) false notes that are played. There are very few; and unless you're jonesing for a mere-nonsense 'entertainment' movie, this movie should appeal to practically anyone.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":148464,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-06-13","keywords":"marriage,hotel,hotel room,writer,dinner","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4026246681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NTEzMjcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU2NzIzOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4NTEzMjcwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU2NzIzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet Celine and Jesse 9 years on. Almost 2 decades have passed since that first meeting on a train bound for Vienna, and we now find them in their early 40's in Greece. Before the clock strikes midnight, we will again become part of their story. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2089090/","name":"Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0273107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0402483/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000500/","name":"Richard Linklater"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Neočekivano putovanje
programme.desc:
The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Directed by Peter Jackson. With Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott. A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0903624/","name":"The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNTE4MTUxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDIyODM4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0903624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"elmeeksio"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great start to a new Trilogy!","reviewBody":"First off I have never read The Hobbit, but from what I gather the book isn't all that long, so the fact that this film is the first of three, suggests they may be milking it a little. That being said however I was very excited to return to Middle Earth for a new story..and I wasn't disappointed in the slightest.

This is the Prequel story to LOTR following the adventures of Bilbo Baggins (Frodo's Uncle played by Ian Holm previously) and how he came to be in possession on the ring. 

Peter Jackson's The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey. .is quite simply a BEAUTIFUL film! I saw the movie in 3D and at the 48fps that Jackson intended and I was blown away by how it looked. It's a stunning film that left me with the same 'WOW' factor that the original trilogy did a decade ago. Set 60 years earlier than Lord of The Rings, We are introduced to a much younger Bilbo Baggins (Martin Freeman). He is a content Hobbit, not concerned with adventure of any sort. Until Gandalf (Ian McKellan) suddenly appears, along with a group of unruly Dwarfs and offers Bilbo the chance to be part of a great adventure. The dwarfs wish to reclaim their homeland, which has been taken over by a huge dragon named Smaug, It's a simple concept and one that probably shouldn't be stretched over 3 movies but as with any 'first in a trilogy' film, it sets the stage perfectly. The movie has some great scenes.. meeting the Dwarfs in Bilbo's house, the run in with fighting stone giants and the escape from deep within the goblins' mountain are particular highlights. I loved the scene in which Bilbo runs into a familiar face (for LOTR fans) in the caves: Gollum (who looks amazing with todays MOCAP technology). Much of the movie, is the journey of the troupe back to the mountain, but also the journey of Bilbo himself.. mild and timid at the start of the film, our hero finds his courage, several times over, through the course of this film. 

Overall I loved this film, I thought it looked fantastic and the care of attention not just aesthetically but also in terms of continuity were obvious. These are Peter Jacksons films, no doubt. Much like he did with the previous trilogy, bringing us into a world full of heroes and villains, orcs and wizards this film literally (thanks to the 3D and FPS rate) literally transports you into Middle Earth.

I am already excited to see the next instalment but to keep me satisfied until then..i may go and watch my LOTR boxset again . And them maybe this film again!

Great stuff!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":779782,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2012-12-12","keywords":"wizard,hobbit,dragon,dwarf,orc","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi650683417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQzNDczNTYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA3ODk0OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQzNDczNTYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA3ODk0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A curious Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, journeys to the Lonely Mountain with a vigorous group of Dwarves to reclaim a treasure stolen from them by the dragon Smaug. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005212/","name":"Ian McKellen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035514/","name":"Richard Armitage"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001392/","name":"Peter Jackson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046203/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909638/","name":"Fran Walsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101991/","name":"Philippa Boyens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001392/","name":"Peter Jackson"}],"duration":"PT2H49M"}</script><metacontent="

Mia et le lion blanc: Directed by Gilles de Maistre. With Daniah De Villiers, Mélanie Laurent, Langley Kirkwood, Ryan Mac Lennan. Mia moves to South Africa with her family to manage a lion farm and develops a special bond with Charlie, a white lion cub. However, things change when she uncovers her father's secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4844148/","name":"Mia et le lion blanc","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFkYTdkYzAtN2MzZS00ZjlmLTkxZWQtODg3YmYxMTdjNjVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzczNzUxNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mia moves to South Africa with her family to manage a lion farm and develops a special bond with Charlie, a white lion cub. However, things change when she uncovers her father's secret.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4844148/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining movie with a conservation message.","reviewBody":"My wife and I watched this at home on DVD from our public library.

Because the story involves a white lion growing from a newborn to an adult male over a three year period, and a young girl, Mia, growing from about 11 to about 14, the movie was actually shot over a three year time period. So there is no substitution of characters, we actually witness the lion and the two kids growing up.

Mia lives with her dad, mom, and brother on a farm in South Africa, primarily raising then selling animals that otherwise would be in the wild. Like lions. One day dad brings home this tiny, cute white lion cub, and they call him Charlie. At first Mia is annoyed with the cub, wants him to leave her alone, but they eventually bond.

When Charlie is about to be sold Mia finds out the actual fate of most of the "trophy" animals, they are sold to become targets of big game hunters in a captive environment, still a legal activity in South Africa. Mia decides to take drastic action to try and save Charlie from that fate.

There is a good "extra" on the disc telling about the process and what had to be done to train the lion to become the young actress' friend and not eat her."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4854,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2018-12-24","keywords":"singing in a car,girl lion relationship,animal in title,pet lion,white lion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3207183129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0MjZiYWEtZGRkOC00ZjEzLTg4OTUtYzRjNzFhNGFmZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0MjZiYWEtZGRkOC00ZjEzLTg4OTUtYzRjNzFhNGFmZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7444538/","name":"Daniah De Villiers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491259/","name":"Mélanie Laurent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456810/","name":"Langley Kirkwood"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537923/","name":"Gilles de Maistre"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0058643/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0461578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7444537/","name":"Prune de Maistre"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204030/","name":"William Davies"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537923/","name":"Gilles de Maistre"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cinderella
Pepeljuga
programme.desc: Cinderella: Directed by Kenneth Branagh. With Cate Blanchett, Lily James, Richard Madden, Helena Bonham Carter. When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1661199/","name":"Cinderella","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxODYyODEzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4OTU0MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1661199/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cricketbat"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good movie, but still unnecessary","reviewBody":"Cinderella is fine. It's a good movie, but it's still unnecessary. This live-action version doesn't really add anything to the story. programme.title: Doctor Sleep
Doktor Sleep
programme.desc: Doctor Sleep: Directed by Mike Flanagan. With Ewan McGregor, Rebecca Ferguson, Kyliegh Curran, Cliff Curtis. Years following the events of The Shining (1980), a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5606664/","name":"Doctor Sleep","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3NGJlYTItYmQ4OS00ZTEwLWIzODItMjMzNWU2MDE0NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQzMDA3MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Years following the events of The Shining (1980), a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5606664/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"slseed1969"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent if you have the right expectations","reviewBody":"If you are going into this film expecting it to be a straight up sequel to the Kubrick film with the same horror tone, you'll be disappointed, however if you have an open mind, this movie is very well directed and acted and the story is very compelling. This is more of a fantasy thriller than a horror film and I really like that about this film. It also does quite a bit of homage to the 1980 film, but takes it into a new and interesting direction with a deep underlying theme direct from Steven King.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163670,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-10-31","keywords":"based on the works of stephen king,hat,vampire,the shining,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi212254489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzUwMDBhNTEtNzc3Yi00NDU0LWEzZWYtMTEzYTJiZGEzNTk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzUwMDBhNTEtNzc3Yi00NDU0LWEzZWYtMTEzYTJiZGEzNTk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Years following the events of "The Shining," a now-adult Dan Torrence meets a young girl with similar powers as his and tries to protect her from a cult known as The True Knot who prey on children with powers to remain immortal."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000191/","name":"Ewan McGregor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272581/","name":"Rebecca Ferguson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7738797/","name":"Kyliegh Curran"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1093039/","name":"Mike Flanagan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059753/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1093039/","name":"Mike Flanagan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000175/","name":"Stephen King"}],"duration":"PT2H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc:
Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Duk"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"excellent, fair to islam, sweeping, narrative could have used tightening...","reviewBody":"I really enjoyed this movie. The way the movie started in Europe and how dark it was there... and the journey to Jerusalem... just wonderful stuff up to that point.

Liam Neeson, as usual, is just SO GOOD, you wish he had more screen time.


* Orlando Bloom, actually surprisingly, was able to carry the movie as a lead. I was surprised he had the heft to do it, but I agree with the critic who said that the beard helped. He was a man, not a boy.



* Battle scenes... incredible. I was really surprised that they could wow me, since we've been numbed by the quality of battle scenes in so many previous movies, but they did a great job.



* Portrayal of the Muslims. EXTREMELY fair. In being "even-handed" to Christians and Muslims there, if anything, they emphasized the Christian fanatics (in the form of the Templars in particular, to simplify things) as being the "badguys" more than anyone else... (which is historically accurate to some degree, in my understanding). I was surprised and pleased that they tried to be accurate, and didn't try to emphasize some "BAD MUSLIMS" to make it "even".



* Movie is very secular in it's moralizing.


And it portrays Christianity particularly religious men, VERY badly (the Priest who steals the cross from Bloom's wife's corpse... the Bishop in Jerusalem who's ready to convert to Islam at the first sign of defeat... and who also wants to abandon the civilians... the knights templar...) I thought this got a tad gratuitous. There were really NO GOOD Christian FIGURES IN THE MOVIE. The only good purported Christians were basically acting Agnostic (Bloom, Neeson, etc.) The actual religious Christians were made out to be hypocrites.

Meanwhile Saladhudin was a man of honor.. but also somewhat moderate.


* Movie could definitely have a little more narrative focus and maybe have a little more of an emotional circle for Orlando Bloom character. The emotional arc is ALREADY complete fairly early in the movie (Bloom becomes a man of conscience)... and it's kind of boring since the character doesn't really move after that.


But the movie tackled a HUGE topic and tackled it fairly well. I just wish there was a better script to handle the compelling personal journey for Orlando Bloom (from widower, murderer seeking redemption, lost bastard son) that was PROMISED at the beginning.

It seems that as soon as he brings water to his father's old land, he's just about done his journey, and it turns into a simple historical battle movie. (but a darn good one)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":274954,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

Liam Neeson, as usual, is just SO GOOD, you wish he had more screen time.

* Battle scenes... incredible. I was really surprised that they could wow me, since we've been numbed by the quality of battle scenes in so many previous movies, but they did a great job.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Neočekivano putovanje
programme.desc:
The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Directed by Peter Jackson. With Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott. A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0903624/","name":"The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNTE4MTUxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDIyODM4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0903624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"elmeeksio"},"dateCreated":"2013-01-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great start to a new Trilogy!","reviewBody":"First off I have never read The Hobbit, but from what I gather the book isn't all that long, so the fact that this film is the first of three, suggests they may be milking it a little. That being said however I was very excited to return to Middle Earth for a new story..and I wasn't disappointed in the slightest.

This is the Prequel story to LOTR following the adventures of Bilbo Baggins (Frodo's Uncle played by Ian Holm previously) and how he came to be in possession on the ring. 

Peter Jackson's The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey. .is quite simply a BEAUTIFUL film! I saw the movie in 3D and at the 48fps that Jackson intended and I was blown away by how it looked. It's a stunning film that left me with the same 'WOW' factor that the original trilogy did a decade ago. Set 60 years earlier than Lord of The Rings, We are introduced to a much younger Bilbo Baggins (Martin Freeman). He is a content Hobbit, not concerned with adventure of any sort. Until Gandalf (Ian McKellan) suddenly appears, along with a group of unruly Dwarfs and offers Bilbo the chance to be part of a great adventure. The dwarfs wish to reclaim their homeland, which has been taken over by a huge dragon named Smaug, It's a simple concept and one that probably shouldn't be stretched over 3 movies but as with any 'first in a trilogy' film, it sets the stage perfectly. The movie has some great scenes.. meeting the Dwarfs in Bilbo's house, the run in with fighting stone giants and the escape from deep within the goblins' mountain are particular highlights. I loved the scene in which Bilbo runs into a familiar face (for LOTR fans) in the caves: Gollum (who looks amazing with todays MOCAP technology). Much of the movie, is the journey of the troupe back to the mountain, but also the journey of Bilbo himself.. mild and timid at the start of the film, our hero finds his courage, several times over, through the course of this film. 

Overall I loved this film, I thought it looked fantastic and the care of attention not just aesthetically but also in terms of continuity were obvious. These are Peter Jacksons films, no doubt. Much like he did with the previous trilogy, bringing us into a world full of heroes and villains, orcs and wizards this film literally (thanks to the 3D and FPS rate) literally transports you into Middle Earth.

I am already excited to see the next instalment but to keep me satisfied until then..i may go and watch my LOTR boxset again . And them maybe this film again!

Great stuff!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":779782,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2012-12-12","keywords":"wizard,hobbit,dragon,dwarf,orc","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi650683417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQzNDczNTYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA3ODk0OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQzNDczNTYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA3ODk0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A curious Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, journeys to the Lonely Mountain with a vigorous group of Dwarves to reclaim a treasure stolen from them by the dragon Smaug. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293509/","name":"Martin Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005212/","name":"Ian McKellen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035514/","name":"Richard Armitage"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001392/","name":"Peter Jackson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046203/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909638/","name":"Fran Walsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101991/","name":"Philippa Boyens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001392/","name":"Peter Jackson"}],"duration":"PT2H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mia et le lion blanc
Mia i bijeli lav
programme.desc:
Mia et le lion blanc: Directed by Gilles de Maistre. With Daniah De Villiers, Mélanie Laurent, Langley Kirkwood, Ryan Mac Lennan. Mia moves to South Africa with her family to manage a lion farm and develops a special bond with Charlie, a white lion cub. However, things change when she uncovers her father's secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4844148/","name":"Mia et le lion blanc","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFkYTdkYzAtN2MzZS00ZjlmLTkxZWQtODg3YmYxMTdjNjVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzczNzUxNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mia moves to South Africa with her family to manage a lion farm and develops a special bond with Charlie, a white lion cub. However, things change when she uncovers her father's secret.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4844148/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining movie with a conservation message.","reviewBody":"My wife and I watched this at home on DVD from our public library.

Because the story involves a white lion growing from a newborn to an adult male over a three year period, and a young girl, Mia, growing from about 11 to about 14, the movie was actually shot over a three year time period. So there is no substitution of characters, we actually witness the lion and the two kids growing up.

Mia lives with her dad, mom, and brother on a farm in South Africa, primarily raising then selling animals that otherwise would be in the wild. Like lions. One day dad brings home this tiny, cute white lion cub, and they call him Charlie. At first Mia is annoyed with the cub, wants him to leave her alone, but they eventually bond.

When Charlie is about to be sold Mia finds out the actual fate of most of the "trophy" animals, they are sold to become targets of big game hunters in a captive environment, still a legal activity in South Africa. Mia decides to take drastic action to try and save Charlie from that fate.

There is a good "extra" on the disc telling about the process and what had to be done to train the lion to become the young actress' friend and not eat her."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4854,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2018-12-24","keywords":"singing in a car,girl lion relationship,animal in title,pet lion,white lion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3207183129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0MjZiYWEtZGRkOC00ZjEzLTg4OTUtYzRjNzFhNGFmZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0MjZiYWEtZGRkOC00ZjEzLTg4OTUtYzRjNzFhNGFmZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7444538/","name":"Daniah De Villiers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491259/","name":"Mélanie Laurent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456810/","name":"Langley Kirkwood"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537923/","name":"Gilles de Maistre"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0058643/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0461578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7444537/","name":"Prune de Maistre"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204030/","name":"William Davies"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537923/","name":"Gilles de Maistre"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="
